abstractText: An 18th century Nepalese paper manuscript of the Guṇakāraṇḍavyūha. On a piece of paper pasted on folio 1r, "A pencilled note [...] by Dr Wright states that the MS. is 105 years old, i.e. written in 1770; but the leaf which contained this date seems to have been lost" (Bendall 1883: 34); however, the overall appearance of the manuscript fits very well with this date.
abstractShort: An 18th century Nepalese paper manuscript of the Guṇakāraṇḍavyūha. On a piece of paper pasted on folio 1r, "A pencilled note
title: Guṇakāraṇḍavyūha
